title: adidas: Mayra Aguiar – It's Forever or Never
description:
Make a move or move out of the way. 

adidas celebrates sports and athletes in a series of “It's Forever or Never” films. Here we have the Brazilian judoka Mayra Aguiar, who has already depicted her talent on mats in Paris, London, Tokyo, Guadalajara, Toronto and more. Watch and you’ll see her in a unique experience in her own country, Brazil, training on the top of the mountain Pedra da Gávea, in Rio de Janeiro. 

The mat at Pedra da Gávea may be something new to Mayra, but she has been training since she was 6 years old. By the age of 11, she had already started the routine of two training sessions a day, six days a week.  

Video Credits:

Direction: 
Luigi Cani 
Mikael Santiago 
Caio Amato 

Executive Production:
Rodrigo Selva “Calota"

Production:
Luana Calainho
Gilson 

Assistant Production:
Mariana Gomes 
Eduardo Rodrigues

Final Cut:
Pedro Dias 
Sabrina Gortz
